eventDeatureData.Heading: Conquer Data Structures and Algorithms
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: A data structure is a designated location that can be used to store and organise data as well as an algorithm is a set of procedures used to solve a certain problem. One can only develop efficient and optimised computer programmes by learning data structures and algorithms.
